mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname As extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY A.id DESC;
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0, delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
